snippet.title: Pilgrim Road – Out Of Eden Walk
snippet.description: They traveled sometimes with a signaling cannon. This was how they communicated. Their columns were a football field wide and miles long. Closely packed. Dusty. Creaking. Tinkling. Moaning. Sighing...

snippet.title: Attendance at religious services, but not religious devotion ...
snippet.description: Across faiths and cultures, attendance at services, but not frequency of prayer, predicts support for suicide attacks.

snippet.title: The Dutch Touch | National Geographic Magazine
Millions of Young Girls Forced Into Marriage
snippet.description: Photographer Stephanie Sinclair discusses covering child marriage, which could affect more than 14 million girls each year by 2020.
